entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
